Actions.Name: Get Admin Area List
Actions.Description: Returns basic information about administrative areas in the specified country.

Actions.Name: Autocomplete search (Cities)
Actions.Description: Returns basic information about locations matching an autocomplete of the search text.

Actions.Name: Get Country List
Actions.Description: Returns basic information about all countries within a specified region.

Actions.Name: Get Current Conditions
Actions.Description: Returns current conditions data for a specific location. Current conditions searches require a location key. Please use the Locations API to obtain the location key for your desired location. By default, a truncated version of the current conditions data is returned. The full object can be obtained by passing "details=true" into the url string.

Actions.Name: Get Current Conditions for Top Cities
Actions.Description: Returns current conditions data for the top 50, 100, or 150 cities worldwide, based on rank.

Actions.Name: Get Daily Forecasts
Actions.Description: Returns daily forecast data for a specific location.

Actions.Name: Get Daily Index Values for a Group of Indices
Actions.Description: Returns daily index data for a specific group of indices, by location key.

Actions.Name: Get Daily Index Values for a Specific Index
Actions.Description: Returns daily index data for a specific index, by location key. Not all daily indices data are available for retrieval, check (https://developer.accuweather.com/list-available-daily-indices)

Actions.Name: Get Daily Index Values for for All Indices
Actions.Description: Returns daily index data for all indices, by location key.

Actions.Name: Geoposition Search (Latitude and Longitude)
Actions.Description: Returns information about a specific location, by GeoPosition (Latitude and Longitude).

Actions.Name: Get Historical Current Conditions (past 24 hours)
Actions.Description: Returns historical current conditions data for a specific location. Current conditions searches require a location key. Please use the Locations API to obtain the location key for your desired location. By default, a truncated version of the current conditions data is returned. The full object can be obtained by passing "details=true" into the url string.

Actions.Name: Get Historical Current Conditions (past 6 hours)
Actions.Description: Returns historical current conditions data for a specific location. Current conditions searches require a location key. Please use the Locations API to obtain the location key for your desired location. By default, a truncated version of the current conditions data is returned. The full object can be obtained by passing "details=true" into the url string.

Actions.Name: Get Hourly Forecasts
Actions.Description: Returns forecast data for the next hour(s) for a specific location.

Actions.Name: Get List of Daily Indices
Actions.Description: Returns metadata for all daily indices.

Actions.Name: Get List of Index Groups
Actions.Description: Returns metadata for all index groups.

Actions.Name: Get List of Indices in a Specific Group
Actions.Description: Returns metadata for all indices in a specified group.

Actions.Name: Get Region List
Actions.Description: Returns basic information about all regions.

Actions.Name: Get Top Cities List
Actions.Description: Returns information for the top 50, 100, or 150 cities, worldwide.
